noun.description: A room where an artist, photographer, sculptor, etc. works.
examples: mostly the painting is done in the studio, working from drawings

noun.description: A film or television production company.
examples: the big names are being snapped up by major studios in the film capital
a big-budget contract with a major studio
all apartments and studios have private facilities

origin: Early 19th century: from Italian, from Latin studium (see study).
